mapper.insert: INSERT INTO model (model_manufacture, model_category, model_name, model_year, model_grade, model_fuel, model_fuel_efficiency, model_seate_num, model_transmission, model_amount_hour, model_amount_day) VALUES (#{modelManufacture}, #{modelCategory}, #{modelName}, #{modelYear}, #{modelGrade}, #{modelFuel}, #{modelFuelEfficiency}, #{modelSeateNum}, #{modelTransmission}, #{modelAmountHour}, #{modelAmountDay});
mapper.update: UPDATE model SET model_manufacture = #{modelManufacture}, model_category = #{modelCategory}, model_name = #{modelName}, model_year = #{modelYear}, model_grade = #{modelGrade}, model_fuel = #{modelFuel}, model_fuel_efficiency = #{modelFuelEfficiency}, model_seate_num = #{modelSeateNum}, model_transmission = #{modelTransmission}, model_amount_hour = #{modelAmountHour}, model_amount_day = #{modelAmountDay} WHERE model_id = #{modelId};
